Het eigentijdse label GOLDBERGH Luxury Sports ontwerpt een high end ski en sports collectie voor de actieve en moderne vrouw Door de exclusieve stijl van GOLDBERGH voelen vrouwen zich onafhankelijk en zelfverzekerd, terwijl ze op hoog niveau uitdagingen in de sneeuw overwinnen of hun grenzen opzoeken in de sportschool De mix van sport en mode maakt de collectie interessant voor zowel sport als modewinkels, Wij zijn vanaf de maand Februari 2021 op zoek naar een, , Marketing Intern, , GOLDBERGH is op zoek naar een marketing stagaire op het hoofdkantoor in Amsterdam Als marketing stagaire ben jij verantwoordelijk voor samenwerkingen met influencers, content creren, uitwerken en plannen voor social media, je helpt mee met het organiseren van events en denk je creatief mee aan nieuwe projecten Geen dag is hetzelfde, , , , Wie ben jij, , Genteresseerd Stuur je cv en motivatie via de onderstaande button

Interested in trading and looking for a parttime role during your studies We have an exciting job opportunity for you become a Trading Analyst at Optiver, , We are looking for ambitious students that are based in the Netherlands, studying towards an academic degree in STEM Science, Technology, Engineering  Mathematics If you want to kickstart your career with a parttime job in a dynamic and international environment, with a competitive salary and flexible work hours, this could be the opportunity for you

Overview, , Our global houseofbrands inspires and empowers youth culture Relentlessly committed to fuel a shared passion for selfexpression, we create unrivaled experiences at the heart of the sport and sneaker communities through the power of our people If you want to be a part of something bigger than you can imagine, youve come to the right place To learn more about the incredible impact were making on both our local and global communities,, , The Manager, People Development MPD reports directly into the VP, Global People  Org Effectiveness COE The MPD is key in supporting the HR strategy by means of facfilitating corporate training nonstore and supporting People  Org Effectiveness POE and business initiatives across Europe, , The MPD supports and drives Learning  Development projects  from identification of business needs, consulting with Business Unit stakeholders  HRBPs through needs assessments, to the delivery and facilitation of LD collective and individual programs partnering with the POE team to ensure alignment with global learning strategy and people initiatives In addition to Learning, the MPD also supports EMEAs talent strategy initiatives partnering with the business and HRBPs to drive team member development The MPDs responsibility also includes the production of training materials, where applicable, and all supporting communications in order to drive a culture of learning, foster participants engagement in the proposed programs, and to ensure the longterm effectiveness of such programs as defined by the Europe and POE strategies

Job Title: Visual QA Tester at MediaMonks Hilversum
Job Description: Description, , MediaMonks is in search of a visuallyoriented QA Tester to ensure our digital campaigns look as promised before theyre released into the wwwild Were looking for someone to help vet the work we produce for a leading manufacturer in the automotive industry, , , , , , , Working at MediaMonks means that youll join a successful and superfastmoving international company creative people would kill to work for The range of work youll craft tests for will never get boring as we constantly expand into new territories of technology In addition, youll be part of a oneofakind company culture, epic lunches, parties, winter sports and other events, and a nextgen pension fund to get you through the Long Night

The Mathematical Institute at Utrecht University is offering a 4year PhD position on the ERC project Chromatic homotopy theory of spaces under the supervision of Gijs Heuts Your primary task will be to carry out research in the context of this project on the interplay of chromatic homotopy theory and unstable homotopy theory the precise goals of the research project are flexible and will be adapted to the strengths and interests of the student In addition, you are expected to carry out some work as a teaching assistant within the department, , , , We expect you to have an MSc degree or equivalent in mathematics, or to obtain such a degree before the starting date of the PhD project Furthermore, we would like you to have a strong background in homotopy theory or related areas A working proficiency in English will be necessary, as well as a collaborative and enterprising attitude towards research in mathematics, , , , Our Institute has a very active topology community including Lennart Meier, Ieke Moerdijk, and Gijs Heuts You will have ample opportunity to participate in seminars and workshops here in Utrecht Funding is available to support travel to conferences and workshops abroad, , , , In addition to the employment conditions laid down in the cao for Dutch Universities, Utrecht University has a number of its own arrangements For example, there are agreements on professional development, leave arrangements and sports We also give you the opportunity to expand your terms of employment yourself via the Employment Conditions Selection Model This is how we like to encourage you to continue to grow, , More information about working at the Faculty of Science can be found here, , , , 38  40 hours per week, , , , Domplein 29

The Environmental Sciences Group ESG at Wageningen University  Research WUR is looking for a talented and enthusiastic senior project manager to lead the development of a visualisation laboratory at WURThe Wageningen Landscape Sensing Laboratory WANDER is a WUR wide demand driven hub for visualising research results to engage stakeholders, students and staff alike in finding solutions together Our physical and social environments are becoming very hard to separate from the digital tools and media we use to observe, interpret, and manage them These tools greatly transform the ways we relate to these environments, to one another, and to ourselves Taking advantage of the interdisciplinary structure of WUR, WANDER will bring together students, staff, and stakeholders to develop immersive and engaging representations of our past, arranging and understanding our present, and planning for the future Be it for a local environment, development of national strategies or our common global future, WANDER will allow WUR to bring together cuttingedge technology, high level research and aspiring students in an interactive and creative environment WANDER will use existing expertise and toplevel techniques of data visualisation to augment the interdisciplinary nature of WUR, thereby enticing staff and stakeholders from around the world to work holistically on a range of landscapes, seascape, foodscapes and others for impact on our futuresWANDER will provide immersive and visual experiences of data representing landscapes and environmental challenges that helps to cocreate, develop and explore new perspectives and scenarios with all stakeholders who want to resolve complex environmental challenges and create impact by finding innovative nature based solutions, tackling environmental problems that endanger a safe and healthy living environment and work towards a sustainable world with benefits for all, , , , , , We offer a temporary position for a period of 2 years with opportunity for a permanent after successful evaluation of individual performance and the viability of WANDER Salary depends on training and work experience and based om a fulltime employment, ranges from  4538, to  6317, gross per month scale 1213 according to the Collective Agreement for Dutch Universities

Job Title: HEAD OF SEO  World Wide Sport
Job Description: Omschrijving HEAD OF SEO  World Wide Sport Wat ga je doen De head of Seo specialist met affiniteit voor sport, die op deze functie past beschikt over de nodige deskundige kennis en staat te trappelen om je collegas te helpen ontwikkelen in jouw vakgebied Je beheert de ontwikkeling van technische SEOimplementaties en neemt stappen om traffic, engagement en zichtbaarheid van onze websites te vergroten Je hebt drive om te leren, te ontwikkelen en nieuwe strategien te implementeren Daarnaast is het belangrijk dat je regelmatig en zelfstandig SEO audits op projecten waar je verantwoordelijk voor bent kan uitvoeren In de audits kijk je naar zoekgedrag en analyseer je websites op gebied van content, techniek en autoriteit en op basis van de verkregen data uit je audits ontwikkel je een SEOstrategie waarmee ranking, relevant bezoek en conversies behaald en behouden worden binnen de organisatie haar funnel Klinkt dit herkenbaar Dan zijn meetbare doelen en KPIs op te stellen die verbeteringen van de SEOactiviteiten laten zien ook niet onbekend voor jou Daarnaast analyseer je dagelijks de prestaties met behulp van dashboards of Google Search Console en uit de audits definieer je concrete acties en taken voor Content Managers, Linkbuilders, jr SEOspecialisten en Development binnen je team Klinkt deze Senior SEOlinkbuilding functie als iets waarin jij je perfect thuis zal voelen Reageer dan direct nog Deze partij is per direct opzoek Wat wordt jou geboden

Job Description  Summary, , Wil je in een multidisciplinaire setting werken aan innovatie en kwaliteitsverbetering in de sector van justitie en veiligheid de strafrechtketen, de vreemdelingenketen, de aanpak van ondermijning en nationale veiligheid Vind je het inspirerend om een concrete bijdrage te leveren aan een veilige en rechtvaardige samenleving En wil jij bijdragen aan de digitalisering in de strafrechtketen Dan is een baan binnen het Justitie  Veiligheidteam van PwC Consulting iets voor jou, , , , PwC adviseert veel organisaties in het veiligheidsdomein bij vraagstukken gericht op digitale en sociale innovatie, kwaliteitsverbetering binnen de primaire en ondersteunende processen, organisatieinrichting en ontwikkeling van professionals Dit kunnen zowel transformaties op organisatie als op ketenniveau zijn, vaak in nauwe samenwerking met financile stakeholders van de betrokken organisaties Tevens is PwC op landelijk niveau betrokken bij beleidsmatige opdrachten in de veiligheidssector, , Het JVteam bestaat uit circa 25 adviseurs die een hart hebben voor de publieke sector en die zich willen inzetten voor maatschappelijk relevante opdrachten Het team werkt aan inspirerende opdrachten voor oa de Nationale Politie, het Openbaar Ministerie, het CJIB, de Rechtspraak, de NCTV, Regionale Informatie en Expertise Centra, de IND, het COA, DTV en voor het kerndepartement van Justitie  Veiligheid, , Deze opdrachten zijn divers van aard Zo zijn wij betrokken bij grotere organisatietransformaties, ketenprogrammas gericht op verbetering van de strafrechtketen zoals de programmas ZSM, USB en Straf met Zorg, kostprijsonderzoeken, onderzoeken naar ICTsystemen en afdelingen, doorlichtingen en evaluatieonderzoeken Ook werken wij aan het thema nationale veiligheid, waarbij onder andere vraagstukken op het gebied van cybersecurity, cybercrime en het tegengaan van radicalisering aan de orde zijn, , Je werkt samen in teams bij de klant waarbij je on the job wordt gecoached door ervaren collegas en zo maximaal kunt leren Het JVteam is een hechte groep met een zeer sterk teamgevoel waarbinnen men altijd klaar staat voor elkaar en we door de diversiteit in onze groep elke dag weer ook van elkaar leren, , , , , , , , , , Heb je interesse Bekijk hier onze sollicitatieprocedure en solliciteer direct via de button Solliciteren Als je jouw sollicitatie inclusief CV, motivatiebrief indient, ontvang je daarna zo spoedig mogelijk bericht over je sollicitatie Heb je vragen Mail mij gerust mirjamvandervlietpwccom

Facility Manager, , Ripstar is een Action Sports Travel Company gebaseerd in Amsterdam en organiseert surf, snow en wakereizen en evenementen naar bestemmingen in Europa en erbuiten Ripstar organiseert de meeste reizen van A tot Z en groeit hard Om deze groei te kunnen realiseren en om te zorgen dat al onze activiteiten operationeel ook perfect uitgevoerd kunnen worden zoeken wij een Facility Manager die in het eerste kwartaal van 2021 kan starten, , Je rapporteert aan het management en werkt nauw samen met de product en operationeel managers en het team van Ripstar Daarnaast ben je als leidinggevende verantwoordelijk voor een klus team en ander uitvoerend personeel Je werkzaamheden zijn seizoensgebonden en in de zomer zorg jij dat alle surf en wakecamps er perfect uitzien en technisch in orde zijn In de winter beheer je de logistiek, onderhoud en materiaal verdeling voor de wintersportreizen en de verhuur bij de groepsreizen Tussen de seizoenen door houd je bezig met onderhoud, inventarisatie, tekenen en het maken van nauwgezette plannen voor de logistiek, opbouw en afbouw van de reizen Waarbij je altijd kostenefficint te werk gaat en duurzaamheid hoog in het vaandel houdt, , Ripstar heeft een eigen wagenpark, meerdere opslaglocaties in binnen en buitenland, vele materialen zoals surfboards, ski  snowboards alsook tenten, lodges en inboedel voor de surfcamps Jij weet hierin het overzicht te houden en te behouden Met je specialistische kennis over deze materialen vervul je ook een belangrijke rol in het meedenken en adviseren van nieuwe investeringen, , In deze functie moet je goed kunnen plannen en organiseren Daarnaast heb je commercieel inzicht en ben je proactief en opmerkzaam Je zult achter je laptop zitten, maar ook veel je handen uit de mouwen steken en naar het buitenland reizen Je zult ook moeten kunnen leidinggeven over een uitvoerend team En niet geheel onbelangrijk, je bent technisch onderlegd of hebt bouwkundige ervaring, , , , , , , , , , Een functie met veel verantwoordelijkheid, waarin geen enkele dag hetzelfde is binnen een inspirerende en prettige werkomgeving met een jong, stoked en dynamisch team Er zijn talloze mogelijkheden om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen, te experimenteren en te ondernemen We bieden je een marktconform salaris binnen de reistoerisme sector Daarnaast bieden we genoeg mogelijkheden om je te ondersteunen in je passie zijnde surfen, wakeboarden, snowboarden enof skin, , Office jobs

Functiebeschrijving, , Functie, , Banen op het park  Entertainment, , Contract type, , Tijdelijk contract, , Arbeidsduur, , Parttimedeeltijds, , Functietitel, , Medewerker Entertainment M, , Functieomschrijving, , , , , Broadway is natuurlijk je ultieme doel, maar de basis van een florerende ster ligt in de prachtige parken van Center Parcs Dat de entertainment shows van Center Parcs een trekpleister zijn voor onze gasten, staat als een paal boven water, , Wil jij jouw entertainment carrire een boost geven Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou, , Binnen het park is er een dagelijks entertainmentprogramma, gericht op zowel kids als volwassenen Als Entertainer ben je een gangmaker en neem je de gasten op sleeptouw door een spetterend optreden in de live show, tijdens een karaoke avond of tijdens de Orry  Friendsshow voor de kids, , Aantal uur per week, , 15, , Wat bieden wij , , , , , Locatie, , Locatie werkplek, , EUROPA, NEDERLAND, Het Heijderbos  Heijen, , Criteria sollicitant, , Minimaal gevraagd opleidingsniveau, , MBOA2, , Minimaal aantal jaren werkervaring, , 0 tot 3 jaar, , Competenties, , , Dat je ervoor gaat om onze kleine en grote gasten een geweldige vakantie te laten beleven, , En verder, , , , , Jij bent het belangrijkste voor ons, als je bij ons werkt Want alleen als onze mensen zich goed voelen, kunnen we onze gasten blij maken En dat doen we graag Daarom zetten we jaarlijks collegas in het zonnetje, tijdens een internationaal gala We dagen elkaar ieder jaar uit op onze eigen European Sports Day Terwijl het management iedereen betrekt bij onze toekomstplannen Is het dan vreemd dat wij trotse en tevreden medewerkers hebben

Wij zijn meer dan een werkgever Wij zijn er voor kinderen n medewerkers, , Kidsfoundation biedt maatwerk voor kinderen n voor medewerkers Want, groeien doe je niet alleen, maar met elkaar Met vestigingen door heel het land geven we kinderen een basis om te groeien en te leren Elke locatie heeft een andere sfeer, dynamiek en een ander karakter Toch is onze werkwijze overal hetzelfde, , Kidsfoundation niet zomaar een keuze, , Eerst mens, dan medewerker Hier tel je mee We kijken naar je wensen, jouw achtergrond en waar je naartoe wilt Samen met je collegas vorm jij een team, een bijzondere omgeving voor medewerkers n voor kinderen, , Koningskinderen is een onderdeel van de Kidsfoundation, , Koningskinderen is een organisatie die zich richt op kwalitatief hoogwaardige kinderopvang in een sprookjesachtige omgeving Een plek waar we de kinderen het gevoel willen geven dat ze thuis zijn Een plek ook waar wij de kinderen stimuleren in hun totale groei en ontwikkeling Kinderen krijgen daarbij de ruimte om dat op hun eigen manier te doen Tijdens de vele knutselactiviteiten en feesten die wij op het kinderdagverblijf organiseren, prikkelen wij de creativiteit en leren wij de kinderen het ritme van het jaar te herkennen Het vaste dagprogramma zorgt voor een zekere rust en stabiliteit, zodat de kinderen goed weten waar ze aan toe zijn Maar ook de gezonde en veilige omgeving en het speciaal ontwikkelde voedingsbeleid onderscheiden Koningskinderen van veel andere kinderopvangorganisaties, , Koningskinderen biedt kinderopvang aan op 7 locaties in de regio t Gooi, tw in Bussum, Naarden, Huizen, Hilversum en Laren Door de grote vraag naar kinderopvang, zijn wij voor diverse vestigingen op zoek naar nieuwe collegas op het kinderdagverblijf 04 jaar Op zoek dus naar jou Ben jij die Koning of Koningin die wij zoeken en wil jij werken in een sprookjesachtige werkomgeving Lees dan snel wat wij jou te bieden hebben En check voor een impressie ook even onze facebook en Instagrampagina, , Koningskinderen is oa in verband met verdere groei van de organisatie bij Berenpels in Bussum op zoek naar Sport BSO medewerkers voor 15 uur per week 3 dagen, , , , Wij Location: Capelle aan den IJssel, South Holland, Netherlands
Job Description: Do you want to be part of an international, innovative, worldclass pharmaceutical company Of an organization committed to putting patients first Pfizer has always evolved with the changing needs of the people who rely on us to create a healthier world, , , , The Country Safety Lead will have key expertise within Pharmacovigilance and will lead and manage the Drug Safety team with focus on high quality and Regulatory as well as internal compliance The Country Safety Lead is capable to motivate and to ensure a healthy worklife balance in an often demanding working day As a people manager the Country Safety Lead will with focus on the individuals and the Team environment on an ongoing basis evaluate need for development andor initiative to be taken to ensure wellbeing and ongoing people engagement The Drug Safety Unit consist of 8 colleagues with a good balance in the experience of team members Knowledge sharing is an integrated part of the working day, where also humor contribute to successful teamwork There is room for individualism and cross functional initiatives when needed, , , , , , , Education Degree  Advanced degree in medicine or in life sciences or equivalent experience Eg Physician, Pharmacist, Nurse, Work experience 5 years within Pharmacovigilance and experience within People management is preferred, KnowledgeCompetencies, , Company values Excellence, Equity, Courage  Joy, , , You will become part of an inspiring corporate culture focusing on people and innovation Pfizer takes care of you by making sure your working environment, conditions and benefits are good In addition to the efforts we expect from you, there will room for growth, development and time and attention for relaxation For example, during the year we organize various sports activities, drinks and voluntary work during working hours  Pfizer4All You can get in touch with all your other colleagues in a relaxed way, , Pfizer is an equal opportunity employer and complies with all applicable equal employment opportunity legislation in each jurisdiction in which it operates, , Medical

At Netflix, we are shaping the future of entertainment with one simple goal to bring people joy Our international efforts have brought Netflixs service and awardwinning Originals programming to viewers all over the world, , To bring joy to global audiences, we need truly global content that doesnt always come from Hollywood As we scale our original content in Europe, Middle East and Africa EMEA, our IP team is in search of an intellectual property counsel to advise film and television productions and executives on all matters related to intellectual property issues across EMEA Those include chain of title research, title clearance, production clearance, IP enforcement, claim defense, and negotiating license agreements This role will closely collaborate with the creative, business, and legal teams that create Netflixs great content This role can be based in our Amsterdam, Berlin, or London offices, , As IP Counsel, your intellectual property experience enables you to work across any situation that may be encountered related to a production You arent phased by the last minute surprises that inevitably arise when shooting a film, series or documentary You can navigate those situations while allowing your studio colleagues to fulfill their creative and business goals You understand the dynamics among showrunners, executive producers, line producers, production departments, marketing and creative, and know when and how to align the appropriate teams when an IP issue arises You have experience evaluating risk with imperfect information and have the confidence to make quick decisions Your expert eye for detail and exceptional organizational talents mean that you are able to improve upon systems to gain efficiency You are passionate about the entertainment industry and are excited to learn more about the business from a nontraditional perspective, , This is an opportunity to shape the future of entertainment The successful candidate will love working in an environment where freedom and responsibility are tenets, and passion, innovation and curiosity are mandates That candidate will also thrive in an environment that values thoughtful efficiency over process, , The role will report to Director of IP based in London Travel throughout Europe and occasional travel to the US will be required when it is safe to travel again

Company Name: Ministerie van Economische Zaken en Klimaat
Job Description: Functiexadomschrijving, , Defensie stelt hoge eisen aan jonge officieren die werken bij de operationele eenheden Zo moeten ze fysiek fit zijn om optimaal te functioneren in toekomstige functies Precies daarvoor zorg jij als instructeur lichamelijke opvoeding en sport Versterk jij ons team in Den Helder, , In jouw functie geef je les in lichamelijke opvoeding en fysieke trainingen aan studenten die opgeleid worden tot officier bij Defensie Fitnessen, hardlopen, zwemmen het komt allemaal voorbij Het mooiste door jou beschikken de studenten over de fysieke conditie die ze nodig hebben in hun werk, , , , , , , , Naast het salaris en vakantiegeld kun je rekenen op een eindejaarsuitkering van 8,33 Defensie hecht sterk aan persoonlijke groei en loopbaanontwikkeling en biedt daarvoor tal van mogelijkheden Tot de secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden behoren onder meer maximaal 75 betaald ouderschapsverlof onder voorwaarden, studiefaciliteiten, een extra verlofregeling voor ouderen en een vergoeding woonwerkverkeer

Are you that enthusiastic researcher that loves to work on design and design methods for novel agricultural production systems that bypass tradeoffs and improve their sustainability performanceThe Farm Technology Group has, together with partners within Wageningen UR, a strong history, background and trackrecord in design of innovative production systems for various agricultural products, from the regular animal and plantrelated products to mushrooms, insects and algae Design or redesign of agricultural production systems and chains is needed to achieve environmental, resourceuse, biodiversity, social and economic goals and bypass tradeoffs between these sustainability goals, eg economic versus environmental goals Besides, structured design methods, their interactive and interdisciplinary implementation are crucial for the invention, conceptualization and adoption in practice of breakthrough innovative system designsAs tenuretrack researcher in this position, you will further adapt and develop the RIO Reflexive Interactive design method in strong interaction with the application of the method to new cases The scientific methodological challenge is to deal with soft requirements and variable motivation of stakeholders, limited reproducibility of some design steps, to include the behaviour and affordances of human, plants and animals in the design process, and to deal with complexity and uncertainty in agricultural production systems Your focus will be on the technical and engineering aspects of the design method and the application to production systems, and the integration of knowledge from social, biological and environmental disciplines Typical examples of system designs we are currently working on are intercropping, minimumtillage and permaculture systems, greenhouses, and welfare friendly systems for animalsYou will realize the objectives by providing input to various current research projects at the Farm Technology group Bachelor and Master students Biosystems Engineering as well as PhDs will be supervised by you during their thesis project You will lead the acquisition of new PhD projects in collaboration with other university groups, industry and colleagues of the contract research institutes within Wageningen UR Project results will be disseminated through papers in peer reviewed journals and conference proceedings Finally, you will contribute to the yearly BSc course Engineering Design and MSc course Biosystems Design Within the Farm Technology group and within Wageningen University  Research you will closely cooperate with other colleagues working in the field of agricultural production systems and precision agriculture, sensors and agricultural robotics, innovation science and environmental sciences

Job Title: Sport en beweegbegeleider Homerun Den Haag
Job Description: Den Haag 24  28 uur per week Werk waarin je ertoe doet In deze functie houd je je hoofdzakelijk bezig met het verzorgen van sport en beweegactiviteiten van clinten Je werkt met verschillende interne en externe betrokkenen samen om clinten de juiste zorg te bieden Daarnaast houd je je bezig met het verrichten van administratieve en organisatorische activiteiten, ontwikkelen van nieuwe activiteiten, ondersteun je je directe collegas waar nodig en proberen we dmv sport en spel de clint fysiek sterker en psychisch weerbaarder te maken Je werkt gedurende elk traject in samenwerking met je collegas om clinten de juiste zorg te bieden Gedragsverandering en risicomanagement nemen een centrale plek in tijdens je werk Je bent in staat om de link te leggen tussen sport en bewegen en de samenhang met omgang van emoties In deze functie krijg je veel vrijheid om jouw ondernemerschap vorm te geven Je kunt netwerken, pionieren en bent het visitekaartje van onze organisatie Bij alles wat je doet ga je uit van hoe je de clint het beste kunt ondersteunen Dat je dit alles vastlegt en overdraagt is voor jou vanzelfsprekend Over onze locatie Bij Homerun Den Haag richten wij ons op jongvolwassenen met een licht verstandelijke beperking en daarnaast multiproblematiek Vaak spelen meerdere complexe problemen tegelijk een rol Hierbij kun je denken aan criminaliteit, verslaving, dak en thuisloosheid en psychiatrische problematiek De jongvolwassenen vallen hierdoor vaak tussen wal en schip Bij Homerun streven wij ernaar om door middel van intensieve trajectcordinatie en trajectbegeleiding deze jongvolwassenen naar een stabiele leefsituatie te krijgen Sporten en bewegen is wat ons betreft een belangrijk onderdeel Wat breng jij mee

Erasmus School of Economics has open PhD positions, , The projects are hosted by Erasmus School of Economics and are affiliated with one of Schools graduate schools ERIM or the Tinbergen Institute Erasmus School of Economics has a long tradition of academic and applied research, and is a leading academic institution, hosting some of the worlds foremost economists in all major areas of economics and business economics, , , , , , , , Furthermore, candidates are required to be admissible to either ERIM ERIM admission requirements or the Tinbergen Institute Tinbergen admission requirements, depending on the specific project, , , , Our PhD projects are fully funded salaried positions with a duration of 4 or 5 years depending on preeducation, meaning that appointed PhD candidates are employees of the Erasmus University Rotterdam EUR Salary and benefits are in accordance with the Collective Labour Agreement for Dutch Universities CAONU The salary for a PhDemployee promovendus starts at 2395, gross per month in the first year, increasing up to 3061, in the last year In addition, the EUR pays an 8 holiday allowance and an endofyear bonus of 83, along with 41 paid leave days in case of fulltime employment, , Our university offers an attractive fringe benefits such as child care and excellent sports facilities Additionally, the flexible Employment Conditions Selection Model allows you to put together your own personal package Depending on the type of appointment, EUR also provides opportunities for personal development by offering short courses in addition to the scientific courses, , Moreover, we offer a Dual Career Programme DCP to assists spouses in their search for a job on the Dutch labour market through an intensive threestep programme with a personalised approach that will suit each individuals unique needs by providing support, training and hopefully creating enjoyment around your spouses job search Furthermore it provides possibilities to get in touch with other internationals and spouses at Erasmus University Rotterdam and in the region through workshops and network events, , The candidates performance is evaluated after 18 months and after a sufficiently satisfactory assessment, the contract is extended for the remainder of the project, , The preferred starting date of PhD appointment is September 1, 2021, , , , 40 hours per week, , , , Burgemeester Oudlaan 50

Looking for a job in sports in an excellent team of traders We bet that this is the perfect job for you Stay ahead of the game and join the Dutch team Organisatie Working for Nederlandse Loterij means working in a dynamic and professional environment To stay ahead of todays competitive online gaming industry, our company is continuously evaluating and rebuilding our strategy In order to do this, we challenge and support our employees to get the maximum out of their talent Our company has great social responsibility and one of our goals is to make the Dutch society happy and healthy To obtain this goal, we carry out our returns through the Ministry of Finance, which is given to the NOCNSF, the overall coordinating Dutch sports organization, and 18 other charities, , Functie Because of new regulation, we expect a growth and more diversity in Sports betting at Nederlandse Loterij We are developing great new games and ways of sports betting The coming years will be a great challenge in the Dutch Market and you can be part of it The Sport trading team of the Nederlandse Loterij is very successful Therefore we are currently seeking an experienced Senior Sports Trader to join our team in the Netherlands Together with the other 9 traders in this team you will be responsible for trading in a number of sports Football will be the most important sport, we are involved in a lot of other sports as well As Sports Trader you will be compiling odds, managing liabilities and trading matches in play We would like to welcome an experienced Trader who also wants to assist in the development of the trading team and who is used working in live betting, taking live decisions on customerslarge bets Responsibilities

ASICS was founded to lift the spirits of the world through sport Thats why were called ASICS Its an acronym from the Latin phrase Anima Sana In Corpore Sano or a Sound Mind in a Sound Body Right from the very start, our founder, Kihachiro Onitsuka saw that sport and movement had the power to lift spirits, project positivity and propel people and whole communities forward We still believe this Our goal is to support more people to experience the positive mental benefits that sport and movement brings And we believe every one of us can make a difference So, when you join ASICS, you join a team who is working together to bring about positive change through movement Together, we are moving minds

MAIN PURPOSE, , To further boost online wholesale performance An inviting role, because business is already booming, and we have the right propositions and tools in place to become even more successful in the digital domain Our groundwork includes a smart digital structure that strengthens every aspect of Rituals crossfunctional operations All we need to realise our online wholesale ambitions, is you That is, if you combine solid SEO and content creation skills with a lets achieve great content together attitude, , YOUR ROLE, , As Online Wholesale Sales  SEO Specialist you fulfil a highimpact position within Rituals Online Wholesale team You support Rituals teams at the head office and on location with bestinclass SEO strategies and content tactics to maximise organic traffic, , The environment makes this even more interesting we do not run a traditional webshop, but a multibrand ecosystem that our valued wholesale partners help create It is up to you to conceive and execute datadriven plans to boost the attractiveness, stickiness, and conversion rate of this platform And yes, all the usual SEO suspects are in scope Think visibility, onsite findability, and desirability You analyse the content and SEO value of brand storesproduct pages and recommend improvements and innovations that add value for Rituals customers and wholesale partners, and boost brand performance Once greenlighted, you implement those changes As for content creation you can fall back on the creativity of the Online Wholesale Specialist and our talented inhouse agency, but it is even better if you contribute relevant, engaging, and highconverting content yourself, , In order to maximise your impact as Online Wholesale Sales  SEO Specialist, you must also leverage partner tools and optimisation mechanisms A deep understanding of these tools and mechanisms will be your key to creating and implementing the winning 360 online growth plan Rituals envisions What sets the role apart, is that there is a second element to it SEO responsibilities aside, you will team up with and help key wholesale partners achieve their online growth potential Eg by sharing deep insights, by translating those into action plans, by aligning stakeholders, and by executing those plans SEO knowledge gets you far, but success in this role requires people and project management skills as well You need to closely cooperate with your counterparts at Rituals wholesale partners, ensuring we work toward shared goals, and constantly realign our plans After all, change is the name of the wholesale game In short, you support central and local teams to meet commercial online targets, in conjunction with wholesale partners and all other stakeholders that contribute to online marketing and growth initiatives, taking offline plans fully into account, , YOUR INGREDIENTS, , , WE ARE RITUALS, , Were not here to sell you beauty we are here to make you feel good Raymond Cloosterman, CEO Rituals, , We are a global brand, established in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, in 2000 Our ambition is to grow sustainably and become  and remain  the number one global luxury brand in cosmetics Today, Rituals operates in more than 730 stores, across 29 countries throughout Europe, Asia, the Middle East and North and South America with the aim to open 1000 stores by 2020, , By joining Rituals, youll get to experience a strong culture and entrepreneurial spirit which empowers you to create your meaningful career We care about the wellbeing of our staff, as much as we value the wellbeing of the planet By passionately looking after both, we believe we can pave the way to a more sustainable world and take appropriate action to limit our footprint on Mother Earth Youll have a strong sense of purpose at Rituals Our mission is to make people feel good and touch as many lives as possible Independent of your role, you will create a positive impact on our daily business, , BECOME PART OF THE RITUALS FAMILY, , If its you were looking for, please dont hesitate and send in your application Well be in touch soon, , Acquisition is not appreciated, , YOUR BODY YOUR SOUL YOUR RITUALS

Your Tasks Will Include The Following, , As Project Controller you will report on a functional basis to the Business Controller and will be situated in the Research and Project Services team You will work with a large degree of independence and with more complex tasks you will assist the Business Controller, , , , Erasmus University Rotterdam EUR, , , , , , contract 1 year, , ISS offers this internationally oriented and varied job in an enthusiastic team, with good working conditions in accordance with the Collective Labor Agreement for Dutch Universities CAO NU, , The starting date of this position is as soon as possible, and you will be based at the International institute of Social Studies in The Hague The successful candidate will be offered a oneyear contract The contract can be extended in case of a positive assessment The position is to be filled on a parttime or fulltime basis 0,81,0 FTE, , In accordance with the conditions applied at Erasmus University Rotterdam as indicated in the Collective Labour Agreement CAO NU of the Dutch universities, the salary is dependent on the candidates experience and is set at a maximum of CAO NU scale 10 with a minimum of  2790, and a maximum of  4402, gross per month, on a fulltime basis In addition, EUR pays an 8 holiday allowance and an endofyear payment of 83 and offers excellent secondary benefits, like a very generous leave scheme Furthermore, EUR is affiliated with ABP for the pension provision and we offer partially paid parental leave Employees can also use EUR facilities, such as the Erasmus sports center and the University library, , ISS is committed to building and sustaining a community based on inclusiveness, equity, and diversity and believe this will contribute to our mission and vision of being the best institute in our field ISS is an equal opportunities employer and encourages applications from candidates of all genders, ethnicities, and nationalities, , , , , , Erasmus University Rotterdam EUR is an internationally oriented university with a strong societal orientation in its education and research EUR scientists and students work in close collaboration with internal and external parties to solve global, social challenges, inspired by the always dynamic and cosmopolitan Rotterdam The current EUR Strategy therefore focuses on Creating positive societal impact Our academic education is intensive, active and application oriented Our research increasingly takes place in multidisciplinary teams, which are strongly intertwined with international networks With its research impact and its highquality education programmes, EUR competes with the top European universities The Erasmian values function as our internal compass and distinguish Erasmus University Rotterdam They entail being engaged with society, a world citizen, connecting, entrepreneurial, and openminded, , , , , , The International Institute of Social Studies ISS is a leading academic centre for international development studies in The Hague and is part of the Erasmus University Rotterdam EUR It is a postgraduate institute of policyoriented critical social science, founded in 1952 The institute offers a PhD in Development Studies, a 155month MA in Development studies with five Majors, and several postgraduate Diploma courses, , ISS is a highly diverse international community of scholars and students from the global South and the North from over 50 different countries It brings together people, ideas and insights in a multidisciplinary setting which nurtures, fosters and promotes critical thinking and innovative research into fundamental social problems The strong partnerships with organizations and individuals in developing countries make up a network where we cocreate knowledge so that teaching and research remain societally relevant Key to the ISS philosophy and practice is the wish to contribute to achieving social justice and equity on a global level Our research focuses on understanding developmental problems that exist in different parts of the world With our teaching we aim to train our students to be global critical citizens, professionals and change agents who can make a difference in the world ISS also acquires and manages externally funded projects for teaching, research and capacity building from a wide range of donors, including NWO, Nuffic, and the European Commission

Join our HelloFresh Family, , At HelloFresh we love food and our mission is to change the way people eat forever That change comes conveniently packaged in a box  a HelloFresh Box, filled with the best fresh ingredients, , With our meal boxes with easy to cook recipes and fresh ingredients, we are driving change in the quickly evolving food industry From developing our recipes to delivering the boxes  the customer is at the center of everything we do Our aim is to make every meal a moment to look forward to, for everyone at the table No surprise then that data is our friend and for us, learning never stops We make quick but informed decisions and as a fastgrowing company, we value flexibility and speed, , , , We are searching for a Talent  Development Lead with a passion for Recruitment and Learning  Development You will be executing the local talent strategy with a team of two specialists in the field of Talent Acquisition, Learning and Development, Onboarding, Diversity  Inclusion, Employer Branding and Candidate Experience, , , You will report to the Head of People and have ownership over the talent pipeline and recruitment strategy together with your team You should be comfortable in a fastgrowing environment and bring a track record of finding ways to improve efficiency and candidate experience Besides that you will have your own set of vacancies for which you guide hiring managers through the process of opening a requisition work with them to gather their requirements provide guidance on their job descriptions and interviews You use data to track time to fill, satisfaction scores etc Datadrivenness is part of our DNA and therefore, it is important that you will bring the use of data within Talent Acquisition to the next level, , , Learning never stops is one of our companys core competencies You will lead and design the full life cycle of blended learning programs including needs analysis, planning, designdevelopment, and training delivery You are key in the support and communication around culture of learning and fostering engagement of participants in our learning programs Through collection of data, survey and associatemanagement input, you measure and provide feedback on the effectiveness You evaluate and help implement new learning technologies and tools, as needed You have an indepth knowledge on MBTI, DISC and Situational Leadership and you have experience in coaching and delivering internal training on these topics, , , We are growing fast and our managers need more proactive support on HR topics As we have been recently certified as a Great Place to Work as the first meal kit provider, we have several projects in place that will support this, but also to improve us being even a greater place to work in the years to come A strong focus will be talent retention and engagement and we are keen to hear your ideas in these fields You are a great proactive contributor to develop the People team to the next level Projects that will support this are eg the roll out of a Job Framework, creating a training path and evaluation cycle, putting Diversity  Inclusion on the agenda and above all being a true HR advisor for our Management, , , , , , , , , , Well, after applying we take a look at your resume and cover letter If we see a match, we will invite you within 5 working days for a video call to get to know each other Are we still positive We will schedule a video interview with you to get to know you better and take a deepdive into the role If both sides would like to proceed we will schedule a chat with our Pauwel, our CEO as the last step in the interview process We will schedule the interviews one after the other quickly, in order to let you know as fast as possible if you can start at HelloFresh, , , , , , Nice, good choice Please click on the apply button below and fill out the mandatory fields Upload your resume and cover letter and thats it Applications sent by email will not be processed, , Before applying please make sure you are eligible to work in the Netherlands, unfortunately, we do not sponsor any work visa or permits for this position, , Wed like to recruit for our own vacancies with our own resources If we would like your help, we will reach out to you

Job Title: Digital Retail Marketing Content Specialist, EMEA
Job Description: Who We Are, , Brooks is a team of passionate people united by a desire to do meaningful work, lead healthy lives and make a difference We share a focused mission to inspire everyone to run and be active Thats it No distractionsits all about the run Through science, creativity, service, authenticity and connection, we obsess over delivering the best running gear on the planet We do it our way, with our unique spirit, with a goal of being more relevant to runners than any other brand, day after day and mile after mile We are determined to innovate, challenging ourselves to lead thought at every turn Inside these walls and on the roads, tracks and trails, we live and breathe Run Happy, celebrating the positive impact running has on our lives and others We inject it into all we do because it makes everything better, smarter, more fun and more memorable Our company culture defines us, bonds us together and creates the conditions for success It is lived daily as a behavioral expression of our collective set of brand values Connect with People, Innovate for our Customer, Compete as a Team, Build Trust, Have Fun  Bring Passion, and Be Active If youre on our team, it means youre part of creating something extraordinary Youre part of Brooks, , , , Brooks is the leader in performance run at retail and has won by creating connections between the brand, the retailer and consumer As the runner becomes more and more digitally connected we see an opportunity to win with the runner and retailer by building this connection in the digital world through partnership with our retailers that pushes the boundaries beyond where we are now, , We are looking for an energetic and tech savvy Digital Content Specialist to support centralized production of bestinclass digital retail marketing tools for the EMEA region In this role, you will be responsible for managing the endtoend digital production process of our EMEA campaign initiatives with a digital and social focus You are a perfect complement to our team, if you combine creative mindset with digital and technical knowledge, and you have great communication and project management skills, , Reporting to the Retail Marketing Manager EMEA, this person will join a team of marketing and advertising specialists who use their unique skill sets to help Brooks grow their businesses in the digital retail age without neglecting the importance of brick  mortar retail While this role sits within the EMEA marketing team, crossfunctional collaboration with the EMEA ecommerce team, the local markets, external agencies and Brooks accounts will be critical, , , , Digital retail marketing, , , , , , , , , , By submitting this application, you expressly make the following representations and warranties and give your consents as described below, , Brooks Sports, Inc collects your personal data for the purposes of managing Brooks Sports, Incs recruitment related activities as well as for organizational planning purposes globally Consequently, Brooks Sports, Inc may use your personal data in relation to the evaluation and selection of applicants including for example setting up and conducting interviews and tests, evaluating and assessing the results thereto and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment processes including the final recruitment, , Brooks Sports, Inc does not disclose your personal data to unauthorized third parties However, as a global corporation consisting of multiple affiliated companies in various countries, Brooks Sports, Inc has international sites and Brooks Sports, Inc uses resources located throughout the world Brooks Sports, Inc may from time to time also use third parties to act on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf You agree to the fact that to the extent necessary your personal data may be transferred andor disclosed to any company within Brooks Sports, Inc group of companies as well as to third parties acting on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf, including also transfers to servers and databases outside the country where you provided Brooks Sports, Inc with your personal data Such transfers may include for example transfers andor disclosures outside the European Economic Area and in the United States of America, , At Brooks, we celebrate diversity  equity We are committed to creating an inclusive environment, and encourage people of all backgrounds, perspectives, experiences, and skills to apply Brooks is proud to be an equal employment opportunity employer All employment decisions are made without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, the presence of a sensory, physical or mental disability, medical condition, military status, marital status, pregnancy or child birth, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, political ideology, or any other nonmerit based factors

Facebook Messenger, Apple Business Chat and WeChat are opening up new business applications with integrated payment possibilities We are uniquely positioned to enable our business customers to connect with their audience through these mobile communication channels, , In the sports sector, it is increasingly important to be at the front of technological developments in order to make the sports experience more attractive and thus guarantee future income CMcom already provides a number of major players in the sports industry with mobile solutions like the KNLTB and the Dutch Grand Prix A combination of data, ticketing and all popular communication channels such as WhatsApp and Apple Business Chat is used to personally reach and facilitate their supporters, , CMcom will deploy its platform to optimize the fan experience Fans can order and receive their tickets via their mobile phone, eliminating the need to print tickets They can also receive relevant notifications about the race in the runup, during and after the event The platform also offers the possibility to order and pay for drinks, foods and other items No more messing around with cash, coins or vouchers, and waiting in long queues, , The Challenge, , This is an entrepreneurial opportunity to be a Sales Representative and grow CMcom within the Netherlands and the sports team We need a gotomarket sales specialist and builder who understands selling a solution to optimize the fan experience You will work on leads that are generated by our Marketing department and have been qualified by our Sales Development Representative SDR Through your thorough understanding of the Sports market and dynamic within these organization you know which persons are the decisionmakers and convert the lead into a committed client After closing the deal our Customer Success Manager CSM will help onboard the client Our goal is to grow internationally and to be a leading partner within the industry, , , , , What else you bring, , , What CM offers, , , CMcom is growing fast, now that the world is preparing itself for Conversational Commerce All major chat apps such as WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Apple Business Chat and WeChat are opening up new business applications with integrated payment possibilities We are uniquely positioned to enable our business customers to connect with their audience through these mobile communication channels, , Today, people all over the world are connected CMcom is a global communication platform CPaaS which provides an enterprise connection to your audience via our industryleading portfolio of messaging channels, a customer data platform, interactive voice solutions, access and identity features and innovative payment capabilities Regardless of device All combined into one platform and suited of APIs, , Through this platform, we enable global brands and enterprises to communicate and transact with their audience and customers in the most efficient way  enabling the right conversation through the mostoptimal channel using the best data Our services are used all over the world, , CMcom was founded in 1999 and has over 540 employees across 16 country offices in Europe, Asia, Africa, Middle East and the United States The CMcom headquarter is located in Breda, the Netherlands, , Apply now and Start the Conversation, , Are you the one we are looking for And do you believe you will fit in and feel comfortable with our business culture Please apply via the apply button with your resume and tell us what excites you about this opportunity You Marketing channel with seasonal Country input as per set GTM process Attend all seasonal sellins and develop quarterly GoToMarket Marketing plans integrated with Sales managers Maintain good relations Verslind jij media, ben je een sportliefhebber en weet je als geen ander business doelstellingen te vertalen naar effectieve, innovatieve en slimme mediastrategien en tactics Weet jij bureaus en mediapartners te betrekken bij onze uitdagingen Ben jij een denker en doener, analytisch, creatief en communicatief Dan is dit de kans voor jou om aan de slag te gaan als Media Manager TOTO Organisatie Werken bij Nederlandse Loterij betekent werken in een dynamische professionele organisatie Om in de competitieve kansspelmarkt succesvol te blijven, bouwen we constant aan een wendbare en weerbare organisatie Dat doen we met medewerkers die uitgedaagd en ondersteund worden het maximale uit hun talenten te halen Je komt te werken bij een maatschappelijk betrokken organisatie Wij willen Nederland gezond en gelukkig maken Dit doen we door onze opbrengst af te dragen aan de Nederlandse samenleving via het ministerie van Financin, aan de sport via NOCNSF en aan achttien goede doelen We bieden vrijheid en zelfstandigheid in een stimulerende werkomgeving met veel opleidingsmogelijkheden en ontwikkelingskansen, een collegiale werksfeer en uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden We vinden het belangrijk dat je bij ons met plezier en trots je werk kunt doen Je wordt onderdeel van het Media Management team van 3 personen Een enthousiast team binnen de Nederlandse Loterij waar je de cruciale schakel bent tussen onze merkenteams, de bureaus en de mediapartners, , Functie De Wet Kansspelen op afstand KOA treedt naar verwachting op 1 maart 2021 in werking en daarna zal de markt voor online kansspelen open gaan Wij kunnen dan bijvoorbeeld live sports betting aan gaan bieden en andere kansspelen mogen we ook online aanbieden Een mooie uitdaging dus met ambitieuze groeidoelstellingen Nederlandse Loterij is ambitieus, ondernemend en streeft naar de nummer n positie op de markt voor online kansspelen Door onder andere een slimme en creatieve inzet van media bereiken wij dit doel Als Media Manager

ScentAir is the global industry leader in sensory branding and comprehensive scent marketing solutions, delivering seven billion enduring scent impressions each year through customers in 119 countries ScentAirs patented delivery systems and highquality fragrances help enhance environments, communicate brands, and create memorable experiences for people around the world We give our clients the tools to sculpt their environments  completing their customers experience by engaging memory and emotions through the sense of smell ScentAir offers a full spectrum of scent and delivery solutions, customizable to reflect and complement any brand or commercial environment, ranging from small retail shops to massive sports stadiums ScentAir is a fastgrowing, privatelyheld company with a corporate head office located in Charlotte, North Carolina, USA Furthermore corporate offices are also located in Hong Kong, The Netherlands Rotterdam, France Toulouse, United Kingdom London  Australia Melbourne, , To meet our strong international ambitions and to maintain a clear growth strategy we are currently looking for an experienced, , , , As a Recruiter with ScentAir, you will be responsible for recruiting talent at all levels, managing the interview and offer process to ensure a positive candidate experience You will be developing and executing recruitment strategies across all lines of business, to promote the ScentAir brand You work at our office in Rotterdam, , , , , , , , , , In return for your skills and experience as Recruiter ,you will be offered a highly attractive compensation package with base salary and bonus opportunity, a pension plan as well as an exciting and fastpaced work environment and autonomy in working, , The company is open to discussing other workplace benefits, including flexible working hours, , For more information regarding this exciting career opportunity please contact, , Mrs Ellis de Jong, Human Resources Manager, EMEA at  31618296587 edejongscentaircom

Job Title: Senior Manager, Supply Chain Excellence EMEA
Job Description: Who We Are Brooks is a team of passionate people united by a desire to do meaningful work, lead healthy lives and make a difference We share a focused mission to inspire everyone to run and be active Thats it No distractionsits all about the run Through science, creativity, service, authenticity and connection, we obsess over delivering the best running gear on the planet We do it our way, with our unique spirit, with a goal of being more relevant to runners than any other brand, day after day and mile after mile We are determined to innovate, challenging ourselves to lead thought at every turn Inside these walls and on the roads, tracks and trails, we live and breathe Run Happy, celebrating the positive impact running has on our lives and others We inject it into all we do because it makes everything better, smarter, more fun and more memorable Our company culture defines us, bonds us together and creates the conditions for success It is lived daily as a behavioral expression of our collective set of brand values Connect with People, Innovate for our Customer, Compete as a Team, Build Trust, Have Fun  Bring Passion, and Be Active If youre on our team, it means youre part of creating something extraordinary Youre part of Brooks Your Job As the Senior Supply Chain Excellence Manager, EMEA you will be responsible for driving supply chain functional and endtoend integration excellence for the EMEA region You will own and lead the Enterprise SOP process design and implementation with the EMEA organization and be responsible for the regionalization of the global SOP standards At the center of Brooks EMEA Supply Chain, you will drive continues improvement across Demand  Supply Planning, Logistics, Distribution and Customer Service You will own and steer multiple Supply Chain improvement and transformation projects across the EMEA organization You will collaborate with both regional and global partners on the development of Supply Chain information  operating systems and people standards  capabilities, , Your Responsibilities, , Lead the design and development of the Enterprise Sales  Operations Planning Process for the EMEA region, in close collaboration with the Global Enterprise SOP leader Guide and operationally lead the implementation of the Enterprise SOP with the EMEA organization and facilitate change management for the region, , Facilitate deep dive sessions with the EMEA Supply Chain SC  Operation teams to achieve full understanding and overview of the current EMEA Supply Chain processes and systems Lead the EMEA SC  Operation teams in achieving alignment with global standard or defining local standard processes Initiate and lead EMEA Supply Chain improvement and transformation projects, working closely with the functional leaders of Demand  Supply Planning, Logistics, Distribution and Customer Service Collaborate with the Sr Manager, SC Transformation on the building  governance of Brooks Supply Chain Standards for systems and analytics to enable business intelligence capability, integration and global reporting automation, , Drive and lead the development of BI reports for local needs and ensure use of global BI reports with the EMEA Supply Chain organization Partner with global and regional functional owners in the development of SC functional excellence toolkit components including training capability, process mapping, KPI, metrics and best practices, , Contribute to the creation of the global Supply Chain Academy capability and lead the implementation within the EMEA region Responsible for the EMEA inputs into the definition of the global functional excellence standards  capabilities Act as a key resource to the Sr Manager SC Transformation with creating a talent development system , including supply chain technical competency model and skill matrix standard capability, and lead the local deployment Collaborate with the Sr Manager, SC Transformation on the creation of a career development path and succession planning standards promoting skills acquisition and E2E career building, in collaboration with department head and HR, and lead the deployment within the EMEA region, , , , Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management or related major, or equivalent experience, , 10 years of operational experience in collaborative Business, Demand and Market Supply Planning and Distribution, , Demonstrated success in contributing to or leading projects for a largecomplex organization Minimum of 5 years of experience with supporting Supply Chain information system and people capabilities in context of business to retail and business to consumereCommerce and complex portfolio Results oriented with a strong focus on the customer both internally and externally Project management and executional excellence be able to turn the vision into reality leansixsigma exposure is a pre Proven track record of impact delivery Excellent verbal and written communication skills, demonstrating effective listening through concise, clear verbal and written communication Track record of managing, developing and motivating teams across multiple departments and locations Excellent interpersonal skills that inspire and build trust resulting in effective working relationships across the company Keen attention to detail in planning, organization and execution of tasks, while still seeing the big picture and understanding how all of the pieces fit together and affect one another, , Ability to anticipate how a decision made can affect our customers, our partners, our products or other departments operations andor morale connecting the dots Successful track record in leading crossfunctional strategic initiatives from concept to completion, leading virtual teams from across the organization, , Demonstration of innovation and initiative  always looking at improving our products and processes while also displaying a willingness to dive into the details and help out wherever necessary, , Embraces and lives the Brooks values connect with people, innovate for our customers, compete as a team, build trust, be active and have fun, bring your passion, , By submitting this application, you expressly make the following representations and warranties and give your consents as described below Brooks Sports, Inc collects your personal data for the purposes of managing Brooks Sports, Incs recruitment related activities as well as for organizational planning purposes globally Consequently, Brooks Sports, Inc may use your personal data in relation to the evaluation and selection of applicants including for example setting up and conducting interviews and tests, evaluating and assessing the results thereto and as is otherwise needed in the recruitment processes including the final recruitment Brooks Sports, Inc does not disclose your personal data to unauthorized third parties However, as a global corporation consisting of multiple affiliated companies in various countries, Brooks Sports, Inc has international sites and Brooks Sports, Inc uses resources located throughout the world Brooks Sports, Inc may from time to time also use third parties to act on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf You agree to the fact that to the extent necessary your personal data may be transferred andor disclosed to any company within Brooks Sports, Inc group of companies as well as to third parties acting on Brooks Sports, Incs behalf, including also transfers to servers and databases outside the country where you provided Brooks Sports, Inc with your personal data Such transfers may include for example transfers andor disclosures outside the European Economic Area and in the United States of AmericaAt Brooks, we celebrate diversity  equity We are committed to creating an inclusive environment, and encourage people of all backgrounds, perspectives, experiences, and skills to apply Brooks is proud to be an equal employment opportunity employer All employment decisions are made without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity, the presence of a sensory, physical or mental disability, medical condition, military status, marital status, pregnancy or child birth, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, status as a victim of domestic violence, sexual assault or stalking, political ideology, or any other nonmerit based factors

Description, , Albelli is bringing peoples moments to life through photo products of all kind Our international team already operates in more than 10 countries worldwide managing different brands to ensure we provide the best possible product and experience for each customer With new challenges and growth ahead, this is an exciting time for albelli and a great opportunity to be part of the team that will contribute to it, , Were looking for a passionate and ambitious Senior SEA Specialist who is curious, openminded and motivated to push hisher own boundaries By joining a topclass SEA team you will be part of an ambitious program when it comes to setup and automation You will be constantly challenging the status quo and exchanging ideas, implementing campaigns and developing concepts on a large scale of projects, all within a very savvy central Performance Marketing Team, , , , As a Senior SEA Specialist, you contribute to the channel revenue and are responsible for one or more large accounts SEA plays a major role in the online strategy We are looking for an ambitious person who is not afraid to take on budget responsibility and participate to build the right thing when it comes to processes, decision making and crossteam projects You also welcome new challenges and are comfortable working in a dynamic environment Although you are curious and have an eye for detail, you never lose sight of the bigger picture, , , , , , , We are looking for someone with an enthusiastic, selfmanaging and proactive character, who can quickly pick up business, set priorities and dares to take ownership The ideal candidate is an experienced SEA Specialist who is brilliant at multitasking and a real team player You can handle different priorities at the same time with outstanding results Preferably you also have basic knowledge of other online channels You enjoy improving yourself and working in a team with other online marketing enthusiasts, , , , , , , , For the safety of our employees and following the measures implemented due to COVID19, we currently work differently Our Amsterdam and Nijmegen offices are closed while our production facility in the Hague is operating with proper safety and health measures Our Recruiting process is currently entirely remote via phone and video calls Our new hires will have a remote onboarding since the wellbeing of our employees is our number one priority For the time being, most of you will be working from home until further notice This situation can change at any time

Wegens recente groei van onze onderneming en verdere ambitieuze internationale groeiplannen, zijn wij op zoek naar een marketing manager, die meewerkt aan het verder professionaliseren van onze marketingafdeling en onze customer experience De aanboden functie is uitdagend en veelzijdig en speelt zich af in een dynamische omgeving Hijzij heeft ervaring opgedaan in een soortgelijke functie die bij voorkeur werkzaam is geweest in de internationale sports  leisure sector, , Wie zijn wij, , Het beursgenoteerde SnowWorld is met haar vijf indoorski faciliteiten in Nederland en het indoor skiresort in Neuss D n van de toonaangevende ondernemingen ter wereld in deze sector SnowWorld biedt een unieke wintersportervaring op echte sneeuw en ontvangt jaarlijks ruim 3 miljoen bezoekers met haar locaties in Amsterdam, Neuss D, Landgraaf, Roosendaal, Rucphen, Terneuzen en Zoetermeer SnowWorld beschikt over pistes in diverse moeilijkheidsgraden, , Naast de indoorski faciliteiten is SnowWorld eveneens exploitant en eigenaar van een Indoor Skydive faciliteit in Roosendaal, een permanente indoor ijskartbaan in Rucphen en klimparken in Landgraaf en Zoetermeer, , Standplaats voor deze functie is Roosendaal maar je zal ook regelmatig op de locaties aanwezig zijn, , Wat je gaat doen, , In deze functie ontwikkel je de afdeling marketing door tot een afdeling, die in staat is om de internationale marktpositie van SnowWorld verder uit te bouwen en te versterken Dit gebeurt via traditionele afzetkanalen maar vooral online en data driven Je analyseert de marketingprocessen en voert verbeteringen door waardoor het werk wordt geoptimaliseerd, , Daarnaast ben je verantwoordelijk voor het opstellen van marketingplannen en budgetten op korte en middellange termijn en draag je zorg voor de realisatie en cordinatie van de hieruit komende activiteiten, zodat het een bijdrage levert bij het behalen van de marketing doelstellingen Je meet de effectiviteit van alle marketingactiviteiten en weet deze, indien nodig, op een effectieve manier bij te sturen, , Als marketing manager geef je leiding aan een team wat momenteel bestaat uit 2 brandmanagers, 1 online marketingmanager en 7 marketeers Je stijl van leidinggeven laat zich verwoorden als coachend, energiek en initiatiefrijk Daarnaast zorg je voor een goede werksfeer op de afdeling, , In deze functie rapporteer je aan de directie van SnowWorld en werk je nauw samen met de brand en online marketing managers, , Wat wij vragen, ,  WO afgerond, dan wel niveau verkregen door ervaring,  Je beschikt over een relevante werkervaring van meer dan 5 jaar Daarnaast heb je minimaal 5 jaar leidinggevende ervaring en heb je gevoel voor creativiteit,  Bekend met alle aspecten van online marketing,  De begrippen zelfstandig, communicatief vaardig, accuraat, creatief, besluitvaardig en teamspeler zijn voor jou vanzelfsprekend,  Affiniteit met wintersport,  Daarnaast beschik je over goede communicatieve vaardigheden in Nederlands, Duits en Engels, , Heb jij interesse in deze functie, Dan ontvangen wij graag je motivatie met CV Je kunt reageren via ons Sollicitatieformulier Website Ga naar website

Job Title: Video Content, Editorial and Rich Media, German Language
Job Description: Video Content, Editorial and Rich Media, German Language  74521, , Gracenote  Netherlands Amsterdam, North Holland, , Lerne Nielsen kennen Mit Bros in 110 Lndern sind wir ein weltweites Unternehmen fr Big Data Analytics unabhngige Messungen, mit Fokus auf Deine Zukunft, , Gracenote, ein Subunternehmen von Nielsen, liefert Musik, Video und Sportinhalte sowie Technologien fr brandneue Unterhaltungsprodukte und marken Gracenote ist der Weltstandard fr Musik und Videoerkennung, die von den grten Marken der Unterhaltungsindustrie untersttzt wird, und verfgt ber beschreibende Daten fr ber 200 Millionen Musiktitel, Fernsehprogrammdaten fr 85 Lnder, und Statistiken fr 4500 Sportligen und ereignisse, , Du kennst vielleicht unseren Markennamen noch nicht, aber jedes mal, wenn Du Dein Fernsehprogramm studierst oder Musik herunterldst, benutzt Du Daten von Gracenote Gracenote Video Content ist ein Teil von Nielsen Content Metadata Dieses Team erstellt und pflegt Daten, die in TV Programmfhrern von bekannten Kabel und Satellitenempfngern, Streaming Plattformen, Webseiten und SmartTVFirmen weltweit genutzt werden, , Derzeit haben wir freie Stellen fr verschiedene Positionen im Klner Bro von Nielsen Content Metadata, , Data Mapping Editor Verwendet Kataloge, die von Broadcast, Streaming und OnDemandDiensten empfangen wurden, um die Daten mit unseren Datenbanken zu verknpfen, , Dies sind Einstiegspositionen, die zweisprachige Kenntnisse in Deutsch und gesprochenem Englisch erfordern, Italienischkenntnisse sind von Vorteil, , Die Jobs erfordern auch viel Verantwortung, da die Arbeitsergebnisse jeden Tag von Millionen von Menschen gesehen und gelesen werden, , Um Dich fr eine oder mehrere der oben genannten Ausschreibungen zu bewerben klicke auf Apply oder Apply Now, , Hinweis jeglicher Schriftverkehr wird unter der Marke Nielsen gefhrt, , , , Explore and Discover Nielsen With offices located in 110 countries, we are a global big data analytics and independent measurement company focused on your future, , Gracenote, a Nielsen company, provides music, video, and sports content along with technologies to the worlds hottest entertainment products and brands Gracenote is the global standard for music and video recognition, which is supported by the largest source of entertainment data Gracenote features descriptions of more than 200 million tracks, TV listings for 85 countries and statistics from 4,500 sports leagues and competitions, , You may not know our name, but you use Gracenote data every time you view your program guide or download music, , We are looking for a FullTime Data Mapping Editor, specifically with German language skills  Italian language is a plus, , We are seeking applicants for positions available in Nielsen Content Metadatas Amsterdam office, ,  Uses catalogues received from broadcast, streaming, and ondemand services to link the data to our databases, ,  These are the creators of the descriptions used to enrich our content metadata Editors are wordsmiths they write and edit movie and tv show descriptions, , These are entrylevel positions that require bilingual skills in German and conversational English Italian language skills would be a plus The positions come with a lot of responsibility because the work created is highly visible and seen by millions of people every day, , Clicking Apply Now enters you into the native German language skills candidate pool for both positions, , Please note that initial written communications will be branded as Nielsen, , , , Were in tune with what the world is watching, buying, and everything in between If you can think of it, were measuring it We sift through the small stuff and piece together big pictures to provide a comprehensive understanding of whats happening now and whats coming next for our clients Todays data is tomorrows marketplace revelation, , We like to be in the middle of the action Thats why you can find us at work in over 100 countries From global industry leaders to small businesses, consumer goods to media companies, we work with them all Were bringing in data 247 and the possibilities are endless See whats next with us at Nielsen careersnielsencom, , Regular, , Amsterdam , North Holland, , , , ,, , No

Job Description, , Welcome to Lepaya, , Our mission is to enable professionals across the globe to be more effective in their work and enjoy more happiness in life Did you know that 85 of your effectiveness at work is determined by soft skills To deliver on our mission, we deliver high impact soft skill training Our training platform provides professionals with the more modern tools to develop themselves online where possible, facetoface where that has more impact, , We launched early 2018 and, the success of our approach is demonstrated by our rapidly expanding clientbase  ranging from the most innovative and fastgrowing scaleups such as Bynder and Picnic, to global corporates such as ING, and LOreal, , We are now fully committed to rapid growth and international expansion, supported by a recent 5 mln investment This makes it the perfect time to step in The new Learning Concept  Program Designer has the opportunity to work in a dynamic and entrepreneurial environment, where heshe plays a central role in achieving ambitious growth, , A word on diversity at Lepaya, all were askin is a little respect To us, it doesnt matter where you were born, what you believe in, how old you are, what you look like, or who you love We believe that different perspectives and backgrounds will actually lift Lepaya to new heights and increase our power of thinking Our passion is to build a strong culture with respect for each others unique experiences, backgrounds, perspectives and skills Join us, as there is a place for you here, , Why do we need you, , We have experienced the power of programmatic learning We have seen how peer groups can challenge and support each other and how learning happens over a longer period of time, applying the right interventions across the program Therefore our offering is focused on programs aimed at three pivotal career points in which we offer the right training at each stage, , As Lepaya expands, we want to grow and improve along three dimensions First we want to further improve our existing programs Of course by continuously improving the individual modules, but also by developing a better flow, driving understanding of where the learner stands and building flexibility and developing interventions to address the specific learning needs Secondly we want to expand our training catalogue towards new audiences and alternative learning needs This may include programs for more senior leaders or specific audiences like sales teams Lastly we want to help our corporate clients to develop their tailor made programs, , We need your deep expertise on developing strong integrated programs that set us apart from our competitors in delivering impact effectively, , Specifically, what we would expect you to have delivered in the next 612 months, , , In an ideal world, who would you be
